Quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
Author: Michael Jordan

Quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
Author: Alan Watts

Quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
Author: Dale Carnegie

Quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
Author: Pablo Neruda

Quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

Quote: When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.
Author: E. W. Howe

Quote: I never considered a difference of opinion in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quote: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quote: If instead of a gem, or even a flower, we should cast the gift of a loving thought into the heart of a friend, that would be giving as the angels give.
Author: George MacDonald

Quote: I want my friend to miss me as long as I miss him.
Author: Saint Augustine

Quote: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.
Author: Dag Hammarskjold

Quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.
Author: King Solomon

Quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
Author: Seneca

Quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
Author: Stephen Covey

Quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
Author: John Wooden

Quote: Look, I don't want to wax philosophic, but I will say that if you're alive you've got to flap your arms and legs, you've got to jump around a lot, for life is the very opposite of death, and therefore you must at very least think noisy and colorfully, or you're not alive.
Author: Mel Brooks

Quote: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.
Author: Frank Lloyd Wright

Quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: My mother-in-law said, 'One day I will dance on your grave.' I said 'I hope you do; I will be buried at sea.'
Author: Les Dawson

Quote: I can only hope to be 10 percent of the mom mine was to me. She encouraged me to be confident and enjoy life. That's what I want for my son.
Author: Charlize Theron

Quote: I'm not the type of guy who enjoys one-night stands. It leaves me feeling very empty and cynical. It's not even fun sexually. I need to feel something for the woman and entertain the vain hope that it may lead to a relationship.
Author: Ben Affleck

Quote: Bringing good news is imparting hope to one's fellow man. The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
Author: Patti Smith

Quote: Cynicism stems from disappointment. Cynical and faithless people were not always like that. They were filled with possibilities and hope as kids. But they tried and perhaps failed.
Author: Robin S. Sharma

Quote: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge.
Author: Patricia Cornwell

Quote: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge.
Author: Patricia Cornwell

Quote: The gift that has been given to me says much about our capacity for great compassion and generosity, and I hope it sends an inspiring message to others about the importance of organ donation.
Author: Steven Cojocaru

Quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
Author: Boethius

Quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
Author: Mortimer Adler

Quote: The quarrels of lovers are the renewal of love.
Author: Jean Racine

Quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
Author: Theodor Adorno

Quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
Author: Tom Robbins

Quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
Author: Stendhal

Quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
Author: Stendhal

Quote: In art and dream may you proceed with abandon. In life may you proceed with balance and stealth.
Author: Patti Smith

Quote: I regard the theatre as the greatest of all art forms, the most immediate way in which a human being can share with another the sense of what it is to be a human being.
Author: Thornton Wilder

Quote: So long as the system of competition in the production and exchange of the means of life goes on, the degradation of the arts will go on; and if that system is to last for ever, then art is doomed, and will surely die; that is to say, civilization will die.
Author: William Morris

Quote: I started to make a study of the art of war and revolution and, whilst abroad, underwent a course in military training. If there was to be guerrilla warfare, I wanted to be able to stand and fight with my people and to share the hazards of war with them.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: There is nothing, Sir, too little for so little a creature as man. It is by studying little things that we attain the great art of having as little misery and as much happiness as possible.
Author: Samuel Johnson

Quote: No skill shapes a child's future success in school or in life more than the ability to read.
Author: Bob Riley

Quote: My private measure of success is daily. If this were to be the last day of my life would I be content with it? To live in a harmonious balance of commitments and pleasures is what I strive for.
Author: Jane Rule

Quote: First-person narrators is the way I know how to write a book with the greatest power and chance of artistic success.
Author: Anne Rice

Quote: I haven't deliberately set out to play the blonde bombshell in my movies. In fact, it's probably been quite the opposite. After the success of The Mask, I wasn't offered all that many blonde bombshell parts, to be honest. I think people believed from the beginning that I could actually walk and talk at the same time.
Author: Cameron Diaz

Quote: I think that the entertainment industry itself has a history of chasing success. Any time a hit product comes out, all the other companies start chasing after that success and trying to recreate it by putting out similar products.
Author: Shigeru Miyamoto

Quote: The success of a hat definitely lies with balancing the personality of the wearer with the type of occasion. Don't listen to those rules about face shape.
Author: Philip Treacy

Quote: I think I've always been somebody, since the deaths of my father and brother, who was afraid to hope. So, I was more prepared for failure and for rejection than for success.
Author: Amy Tan

Quote: I think I've always been somebody, since the deaths of my father and brother, who was afraid to hope. So, I was more prepared for failure and for rejection than for success.
Author: Amy Tan

Quote: I think the main thing about comedy and humor is that it's impossible and always was impossible to define.
Author: Mike Nichols

Quote: Never say a humorous thing to a man who does not possess humor. He will always use it in evidence against you.
Author: Herbert Beerbohm Tree

Quote: Humor can bring people under the tent. And a good joke can deflect some of the intensity surrounding a serious subject.
Author: Ted Danson

Quote: In Buddhism, they say attachment to anything only leads to suffering. So when we laugh, it's our way of saying, 'I'm unattached to that.' You're tickled by it, it makes your lobes do something on their own. So humor is very important to me. I always take that to the stage first.
Author: Jason Mraz

Quote: I love British humor. It's just so - surreal.
Author: Beck

Quote: I've got a sense of humor. I'm a funny guy.
Author: Daryl Hall

Quote: Humor is such a wonderful thing, helping you realize what a fool you are but how beautiful that is at the same time.
Author: Lynda Barry

Quote: Life Is Full of Obstacles, Stumble Upon !!
Author: Pratik Shelar
